<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/user-schemas/{id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves the details of a specific user type schema by its ID.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
>

>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
